name: In Your Realm
description: In Your Realm gives an old-school, challenging, RPG roguelike experience with randomized encounters and a unique combat system. To beat the game the player needs to plow through every weakness of their personality - represented in the game as bosses in their respective worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 minimum resolution Storage: 6 GB available space
